title: Live More: Magic Begins with You
description: It doesn't matter how much we achieve materially, but if we are not content from within, then we will keep longing for happiness and will keep moving from one thing to the next, in search of eternal Joy. Live More provides you with the tools and the guidance to add more Joy to your life. This book takes you on a journey of self-exploration and provides you with exercises which can help you eliminate the negativity from your life.It makes you aware of the blocks which are holding you back from living a Joyful life, guides you to eliminate them and provides new ways to revive the Magic of life.Let us begin this Joyride and let the Magic of life Unfold.Because, the Magic Begins with You.
author: Mridula Singh
